name: Blob Simulator 2020
description:
This is part of the Honest Dan Game Jam!

A long time ago, when JohnGames was young, he would draw a blob.

In tribute to my youth, I have recreated my favorite house from childhood, along with the blob himself.

Your goal is to help nourish poor blob from the years of hunger. It should take less than 5 minutes to finish a game.

Feed the blob, FEED HIM!

Make way for your growing boy with decoration ability!

Development  was all streamed on https://twitch.tv/johngames
